mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ktf_org_dept t WHERE FIND_IN_SET(t.id, org_dept_getChildren(#{id}))

DELETE FROM ktf_org_dept WHERE id IN ( SELECT a.id FROM ( SELECT t0.id, t1.id AS pid FROM ktf_org_dept t0 LEFT JOIN ktf_org_dept t1 ON t0.pid = t1.id WHERE t0.pid > 0 GROUP BY t0.pid ) a WHERE a.pid IS NULL )
